artist: Torii Kotondo; Published by Kawaguchi Jirō
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: so-called brown version; head and torso of woman wearing black and white patterned kimono and obi with red, pink, green and white floral design; same image as L2001.372.155 with different colors
marks: 昭和四年十一月 {Shōwa yonen jūichigatsu} (November 1929) 言人画 {Kotondo ga} (picture by Kotondo)
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper with mica
title: Sash
